name: daclion-online
description: Real-time multiplayer game with React and Socket.io

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build: bash -c 'unset npm_config_prefix && . $HOME/.nvm/nvm.sh && nvm use && cd server && node_modules/.bin/tsc && cd ../client && node_modules/.bin/tsc -b && node_modules/.bin/vite build'
scripts.build:window: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
